properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.authUserCurriculumFilesPath
properties.description: Folder of the user curriculum files

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.authUserEntityQueryFilesPath
properties.description: Folder of the user entity query files

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.useAjaxToRefreshJobCompanyLogos
properties.description: Indicator of use of Ajax to refresh company logotypes instead of URL params

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.useEntityManagerCache
properties.description: Indicator of use of the cache that relates AbstractEntity classes with their EntityManagers

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.useParallelStreams
properties.description: Indicator of use of parallel or sequential streams in the application

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.signupConfirmationLinkExpirationHours
properties.description: Expiration hours of the signup confirmation link.

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.resetPasswordLinkExpirationHours
properties.description: Expiration hours of the reset password link

properties.name: jobvacanciesapp.defaultInitialTableSortingDirectionCode
properties.description: Default initial sorting direction in entity tables

properties.description: Default initial page size in entity tables
